name: Enlightened Word
text: All across Kara-Tur, runepriests go from village to village teaching not only literacy, but also the lessons found in the Path of Enlightenment. Such selfless acts, in turn, bring these runepriests closer to their own enlightenment. Recognizing this truth, a few shan zi learn how to share their blessings with their comrades and allies, further pushing back the darkness so that the light of the Celestial Emperor can purge the world of ignorance and evil. The following paragon path is available to any honorable runepriest who strives to become the consummate leader, acting through his or her allies to vanquish the opposition.

features.cloudStep(11thLevel): Whenever you enter a new rune state, you can enter the rune state of the cloud step instead
features.sharedEnlightenmentAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to use a runepriest attack power, you can choose for that attack to originate from the space of an ally within 5 squares of you, instead of originating from your space
features.radiantCloudStep(16thLevel): During the flight granted by the rune state of the cloud step, you are insubstantial and phasing

flavorText: My calling could not be more sacred. I am the Word that lights the Path.
